product_name: Clif Shot Protein Recovery Drink Mix - Single Serving
long_description: Help speed yourself along to a fast recovery with the Clif Shot Protein Recovery drink, ideal for refueling and rebuilding tired muscles after intense or prolonged activity. Formula uses organic glucose and organic dried cane syrup, along with ingredients originating from non-GMO sources for pure, clean energy. Fortified with an arsenal of amino acids, antioxidants, electrolytes, protein and carbohydrates to provide your body with needed recovery resources. Clif Shot Protein Recovery drink is best consumed during the critical 30 min. window following activity; makes 8 fl. oz. Each serving supplies carbohydrates for needed energy replenishment, protein for muscle repair and carbohydrate re-uptake and crucial electrolytes. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Help speed yourself along to a fast recovery with the Clif Shot Protein Recovery drink, ideal for refueling and rebuilding tired muscles after intense or prolonged activity.
